nycflights13 data

Mauricio Vargas and Jonathan Keane

2020-05-18

Source: vignettes/nycflights.Rmd
nycflights.Rmd

dittodb uses the nycflights13 dataset for testing and example purposes.

Exploring nycflights13

The nycflights13 dataset contains airline on-time data for all flights departing NYC in 2013. It also includes useful ‘metadata’ on airlines, airports, weather, and planes.

Have a look to the database schema:

nycflights13 relational diagram.

Adding nycflights13 data to a database

dittodb has a few functions that make loading nycflights13 data into a database easier. nycflights13_sql(con, schema = "nycflights") will write the nycflights13 data to the database connect to with con and write it to the schema nycflights.

To quickly set up an SQLite version nycflights13_sqlite() will create an in-memory SQLite database with the nycflights13 data.
